attributes.action: ignore the recommendations from the Casino Advisory Panel and give the Super-Casino to Blackpool.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blackpool needs the regional casino as a catalyst to its regeneration - there are no realistic alternatives.  It's the peoples' choice and government should take this into account.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
